page.title: 09Houses
page.content:
The new Strawberry Hill houses have 4 bedrooms. The area they are building on is very muddy and dusty. There are 4 bedroom houses, 3 bedroom houses and 2 bedroom houses being built. We have a lot of workmen coming in and out of the house because our house is not finshed completely.I liked living in my old house more becouse it was bigger.We moved to our new house because it was smaller. We have been quite lucky with our house because next door to us they have had water coming out of the toilet and out of the shower. Donna Siggs age 10
On the South Coast Road there are some old nineteenth century coastguard cottages built from flint, but the new houses are brick or board.
